title: 怎么清除地皮所有的动物
author: [NGA]

replies.author: qq1341581495
replies.txt_content:
在多世界插件里\plugins\Multiverse-Core\worlds里面可以设置
  world_the_end:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: world_the_end
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'true'
    scale: '16.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: NORMAL
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      x: 0.0
      y: 60.0
      z: 0.0
      pitch: 0.0
      yaw: 0.0
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: THE_END
    seed: '-3267905463364441259'
    generator: 'null'
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'复制代码
把里面的animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'（改成false）
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []复制代码

replies.author: Minecraft天兆
replies.txt_content: 目前地皮插件没有这个功能，如果你是op你可以打/killall 杀死附近全部生物，要是生存。自己杀吧

replies.author: qq1341581495
replies.txt_content: 在多世界插件里\plugins\Multiverse-Core\worlds里面可以设置
